attributes.richTextValue: See for yourself why over 500K+ users are using insightsoftware

attributes.text: Simplify and Streamline Your Financial and Operation Reporting Directly Inside of Excel

attributes.richTextValue:
Report on Live Dynamics Data

Right in Excel


Easily export data from your Dynamics AX or D365 F&SCM ERP into excel with 1-click. No more manual downloads or CSVs.

Shrink Reporting Cycles and Effort


Eliminate manual data dumps and enable business users to build refreshable reports using easy-to-configure, pre-built report templates.

Remove IT and Enable Self-Service Reporting

Free your team to explore data and create or modify reports on their own with no hard coding or programming skills required.

Drill into Transaction-level Data


Drill into balances, journals, and subledgers from within Excel to answer follow-up questions and to find and fix issues fast. Explore data outside your initial query without switching to another report.

Bulk Upload from Excel into Microsoft Dynamics


Save time with bulk uploads using Atlas’ secure, simple, and intuitive data upload tool for Microsoft Dynamics. Users can choose from a rich library of templates or quickly create a custom upload template, easily append, and update data to any table.

Get More Productive with Power BI


Consolidate data from several Dynamics modules into a single query so IT teams can effortlessly publish Dynamics data into Power BI and generate powerful dashboards for users across the business.

attributes.text: Automate and Accelerate Microsoft Dynamics Reporting

attributes.richTextValue:
Realize Value from Day One


Get up and running within a matter of hours and deliver production reports

within a matter of days. Atlas comes packed with more than 150 pre-built

reporting and uploading templates to jumpstart report creation from the

get-go. You can use these out-of-the-box templates immediately or

customize them to suit your needs.

Financial Reporting in a Familiar Environment


Quickly and easily generate timely, accurate financial reports in the

format that works for you, using the same fields and calculations you’re

used to, right inside of Excel. Just the real-time data you need, directly

from your Microsoft Dynamics database, exactly the way you want it.

Cut Reporting Time and Costs


Create a custom report in minutes working with over 50 new transactional

entities to answer pressing business questions, without having to customize

AX or D365 F&SCM. No hard coding or programming skills are required,

removing the need for consultants or resource-strapped IT departments

to get you the reports you need. Easily schedule and distribute reports to

your team members and automate the upload of your accrual’s journals

into Microsoft Dynamics with the click of a button.

Combine Data Across Entities and Sources to See the Big Picture


Easily generate reports by blending data across multiple sources, including Dynamics AX,

D365 F&SCM and more, to address your most difficult questions without relying on

IT assistance,. Mix and match data from multiple sources to see the big picture.

Use data from all Microsoft D365 F&SCM or AX modules, including vertical and

customized tables, while inheriting the native Microsoft Dynamics security framework
